summary: Current water quality is stable but requires monitoring due to slight pH increase and TDS decrease.

insights.recommendation: Monitor closely; maintain pH between 6.5 and 7.5 for optimal tilapia health.
Check for nutrient levels; consider adding supplements if TDS continues to drop.
Maintain temperature between 25°C and 30°C for optimal growth of tilapia and plants.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.057 / 7.025 / 7.073 (trend: up)
• TDS avg/min/max: 308.975 / 295.8 / 347.6 ppm (trend: down)
• Temp avg/min/max: 28.043 / 27.25 / 29.44 °C (trend: up)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
